amendment.description: To modify the number of military personnel and civilians who may be assigned or retained in connection with Plan Colombia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3423 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 140.

action.text: Amendment SA 3423 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To modify the number of military personnel and civilians who may be assigned or retained in connection with Plan Colombia.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3423 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 140.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3423 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 140.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3423 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Byrd.
